thread.title: British tourist bus crashes in Switzerland, 41 hurt
thread.title_full: British tourist bus crashes in Switzerland, 41 hurt | News24

author: news24.com
title: British tourist bus crashes in Switzerland, 41 hurt
text:
Zurich - Forty-one people were injured in central Switzerland when a British tourist bus and four trucks were involved in a collision on Friday, police said.
Four people suffered serious injuries in the accident that occurred in a construction zone on a motorway between the towns of Sempach and Sursee.
The cause was under investigation.
At least three rescue helicopters and several ambulances went to the accident site about 40km southwest of Zurich.
